basics.name: JR Lee
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Hi! I am currently a Computer Science student at the University of Hawaii at Manoa with a passion for data science and languages.

work.summary: Analyzed and visualized Census Bureau data to drive decisions on resource allocation to resolve inequities in the community
highlights: Presented findings of Census Bureau analysis to Council Member Weyer
Developed a data pipeline using Census Bureau APIs and PostreSQL databases

work.summary: Translated and proofread material from Chinese to English for a mobile game.
highlights: Optimized workflow by developing Python scripts and Google Sheets formulae to automatically translate and proofread repetitive content
Collaborate with a multilingual, multicultural group to localize game content

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.awarder: University of Colorado Boulder, University of Hawai'i
awards.summary: Maintained a high GPA for all semesters of college.
